content:
Hi,

Zulip production instance needs to be migrated to an external LDAP directory. (Migrating from one company LDAP to another )

Could you please let me know how to go about this.
The userids are different in the new external LDAP.

Thank You

@Deepa Annamalai you just need to configure your Zulip server following https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/authentication-methods.html#ldap-including-active-directory to work with the new directory; you can test your configuration with manage.py query_ldap.
